definition: "Erheblich" is an adjective that describes something of significant or considerable nature. It is commonly used to emphasize the extent, magnitude, or importance of a particular quality, quantity, or impact.

examples.german: Er hat erhebliche Schwierigkeiten bei der Arbeit.
examples.english: He has considerable difficulties at work.
